name: 2D Karlson
description:
this is a shooter game! 

[CONTROLS]

W - walk

Mouse Pointer - point where to walk

SPACEBAR - shoot

[POWER UPS]

Milk - Gives you 2+ Lifes

[ABOUT]

This is a shooting game! i know it says 2d karlson but. its just a shooting game!
